author: kreczko
body:
Final part of https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-588:
 - implements normalisation of L1 vs offline histograms to bin area (for Jets & Energy Sums)
 - adds all member variables to initializer list
title: [L1T][DQMOffline] Normalizing L1 vs offline histograms to bin area  (Jets & Energy Sums)
